name: Free Gift Product For Woocommerce
author: silverplugins217

sections.description:
Free Gifts Product For Woocommerce Set a fee for gift and up your revenue with every order. WooCommerce Multiple Free Gift make to many way to gift product in woocommmerce.

This plugin allows your users to Gift individual products from the product page or your users can Gift their entire order from the cart or checkout page.

Woocommerce Add Free Product make to custom will be attached to purchase any kind of product in woocommerce

FEATURES FOR FREE GIFTS PRODUCT FOR WOOCOMMERCE:

  • Easy to use
  • You can choose popup and list view.
  • Customized gift block title font size
  • Add Manually gift product title , notice.
  • Remove gift product from cart if rule does not Pass
  • Gift product add conditionally with product wise
  • Gift product add conditionally with category wise and Price
  • Allow/Disallow Gifts to Only Logged in Users
  • Customize Font Size and Font Color for Motivational Message
  • Customize Gift Product Add to cart Button text
  • WPML Support

ðŸ“½Documentation | Demo | ðŸ“½Support | ðŸ“½Get Pro

FEATURES FOR FREE GIFTS PRODUCT FOR WOOCOMMERCE PREMIUM:

  • Enable gift products on checkout page
  • Multiple product allowed by product wise, category wise and Price.
  • Allow for only one type of multiple gift
  • Allow Includive And Excludive tax Count in Minimum Cart Total

CONTRIBUTE AND TRANSLATE

Free Gifts Product For Woocommerce is translated into multiple languages Chinese, Dutch, Russian, Spanish, and many more. Help localize Free Gifts Product For Woocommerce even further by adding your locale Language. Click Here
sections.faq:
How to Use Gift product for woocommerce

You can Allow Multiple product for gift with product base , price base and category base
